h1_title: Chapter 1 Secret - Ancient Guanyin Temple Walkthrough
h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Elder Jinchi
content: Once enough have been absorbed by either you or him, he’ll return to the ground and the fight will resume.

The content is as follows:
Once enough have been absorbed by either you or him, he’ll return to the ground and the fight will resume.
